name: Melffy Pinny
effectText: If a face-up Beast monster you control was returned to the hand this turn, except "Melffy Pinny" (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 Synchro Monster using only this card you control and "Melffy" monsters in your hand. During your End Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can target 1 Beast Xyz Monster you control; attach this card to it as material. You can only use each effect of "Melffy Pinny" once per turn.
